title: Field Remedy: 1716
subject: Oil/Water Heat Exchanger - Leaky
complaint:
Leakages/cracks on oil/water heat exchanger
caused by corrosion due to coolant liquid which was not according
to Opel specification.
cause:
Wrong coolant liquid and/or wrong mixture
ratio.

remedyContent.text:
When replacing the coolant liquid for maintanance or repair reasons, please
make sure that 
a.) the correct liquid is used, 
b.) the correct mixture ratio is assured. 
Correct coolant liquid and mixture ratio are included in TIS2000 Service
Instruction.
